location: Field entrance near duck shelter, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: grass_cutting_machine_preparation
summary: Preparation of a grass cutting machine prior to field maintenance.
description: This data unit documents the preparation of a grass cutting machine positioned at the field entrance near the duck shelter at MaMeeFarm. The preparation follows observed overgrown grass conditions recorded in Data Unit 00328 and represents the pre-operation stage before vegetation control activities.

external_reference.note: Grass cutting machine prepared for use near overgrown area.
